name: GHA 変更ファイルで条件分岐
description: dorny/paths-filter で差分に応じてジョブ実行を分岐。

files.template:
name: CI
on: [pull_request]
jobs:
  filter:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - id: filter
        uses: dorny/paths-filter@v3
        with:
          filters: |
            js:
              - 'src/**/*.js'
            docs:
              - 'docs/**'
      - name: Build JS
        if: steps.filter.outputs.js == 'true'
        run: echo build js
      - name: Check docs
        if: steps.filter.outputs.docs == 'true'
        run: echo check docs
